00040 #ifndef _CONT_PTR_UTILS_H
00041 #define _CONT_PTR_UTILS_H
00042 
00055 struct dereference
00056 {
00057     template <typename _Tp>
00058     const _Tp& operator()(const _Tp* pointer) const
00059     {
00060         return *pointer;
00061     }
00062 };
00063 
00077 struct dereference_less
00078 {
00079     template <typename _Pointer>
00080     bool operator()(const _Pointer& pointer1, const _Pointer& pointer2) const
00081     {
00082         return *pointer1 < *pointer2;
00083     }
00084 };
00085 
00096 struct delete_object
00097 {
00098     template <typename _Tp>
00099     void operator()(_Tp* pointer) const
00100     {
00101         delete pointer;
00102     }
00103 };
00104 
00115 template <typename _OutputStrm, typename _StringType = const char*>
00116 struct output_object
00117 {
00118     output_object(_OutputStrm& outs, const _StringType& sep)
00119         : _M_outs(outs), _M_sep(sep)
00120     {}
00121 
00122     template <typename _Pointer>
00123     void operator()(const _Pointer& pointer) const
00124     {
00125         _M_outs << *pointer << _M_sep;
00126     }
00127 
00128 private:
00129     _OutputStrm& _M_outs;
00130     _StringType  _M_sep;
00131 };
